title: Limitations on use of warrantor's name
context: [ยง481R-11] Limitations on use of warrantor&rsquo;s name. (a) A warrantor shall not use: (1) In its name, the word &ldquo;casualty&rdquo;, &ldquo;surety&rdquo;, &ldquo;insurance&rdquo;, or &ldquo;mutual&rdquo; or any other word descriptive of the casualty, insurance, or surety business; or (2) A name deceptively similar to the name or description of any insurance company, surety corporation, or other warrantor. (b) A warrantor may use the word &ldquo;guaranty&rdquo; or a similar word in the warrantor&rsquo;s name. [L 2002, c 237, pt of ยง1]
